text: <@U026103R3> i have an adidas second amendment queued up where i only need to change hours and dollars.
josh and i are meeting this afternoon to go over estimates, i'll follow up with you/send you that information afterwards
if you want that again, we can use it. or i can strike it and play it more loose.
yea, tbh i'm not sure if Ed has a budget in mind for this new work. last time it was because the budget was small and we knew the hours would be very close
i'll be ready to roll either way you advise

ok let me make that call after the estimates meeting, but right now i'm leaning more towards putting a checkpoint on the calendar for when i let him know how many hours we've burned, versus letting him know which date we've hit a certain hour mark
